hit show- and the two superstars wowed contestants and TV critics with their enthusiastic response to wannabes at auditions in New Jersey, which were taped last year. "Not only are they great to look at, Jennifer Lopez and Steven Tyler are long-time stars who have nothing to gain, or lose, by being part of American Idol. wishing the Tony Blair , his family and his brilliant and dedicated team the very best for what I'm sure will be a long and successful future in Government." Mr David Cameron said in a statement: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. I wish Andy Coulson all the very best for his future, which I am certain will be a successful one. Last week Mr David Cameron refused to confirm or deny reports that Mr Andy Coulson had offered to resign to spare the Government further damage. to push the Columbus Republican toward the White House. A group of South Carolina lawmakers stood on the steps of their state Capitol on Wednesday to encourage Mike Pence to run. It's not a complicated message, but it's a heartfelt one, state Dick Armey Kris Crawford said. "We would like him on the ballot." Leaders of the conservative movement made the same argument in a letter to Mike Pence this week.
